00028 void DnsSdService::Init()
00029 {
00030     Name.Empty();
00031     Protocol.Empty();
00032     Transport.Empty();
00033     nTransport = UNKNOWN;
00034     Domain.Empty();
00035     Port = 0;
00036     HostName.Empty();
00037     RegisteredName.Empty();
00038 }
00039 
00040 void DnsSdService::Init( const SimpleString eFullName, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString eHostName /* = SimpleString::EmptyString */ )
00041 {
00042     int LastFind;
00043     int CurrentFind;
00044 
00045     Empty();
00046 
00047     if ( eFullName.IsEmpty() || ePort == 0 )
00048     {
00049         return;
00050     }
00051 
00052     CompleteServiceName = eFullName;
00053 
00054     if ( (LastFind=CompleteServiceName.Find("._tcp.")) >= 0 )
00055     {
00056         // TCP DnsSdService
00057         nTransport = TCP;
00058         Transport  = "_tcp";
00059     }
00060     else
00061     {
00062         if ( (LastFind=CompleteServiceName.Find("._udp.")) >= 0 )
00063         {
00064             // UDP DnsSdService
00065             nTransport = UDP;
00066             Transport  = "_udp";
00067         }
00068     }
00069 
00070     // Not a supported protocol...
00071     if ( nTransport == UNKNOWN )
00072     {
00073         Init();
00074         throw ServiceException( "Transport protocol must be '_tcp' or '_udp'" );
00075     }
00076 
00077     // Last find is the beginning of the Protocol, its len is 6,
00078     // So we can compute other information.
00079 
00080     // Let's try to analyse the name
00081     Domain = CompleteServiceName.SubString(LastFind+6, -1);      // 6 is the len of "._udp." or "._tcp_.";
00082 
00083     SimpleString TmpString = CompleteServiceName.SubString( 0, LastFind);
00084 
00085     // Search for the last occurence of "._" couple
00086     CurrentFind = TmpString.Find("._", true);
00087 
00088     if ( CurrentFind == -1 )
00089     {
00090         Init();
00091         return;
00092     }
00093 
00094     // Extract Name an protocol
00095     Name = CompleteServiceName.SubString( 0, CurrentFind );
00096     Protocol = CompleteServiceName.SubString( CurrentFind+1, LastFind );
00097 
00098     Port = ePort;
00099 
00100     if ( eHostName.IsEmpty() )
00101     {
00102         HostName = Socket::GetHostName();
00103     }
00104     else
00105     {
00106         HostName = eHostName;
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 // Static fonction to process data from DNS-SD
00111 SimpleString DnsSdService::GetDNSSDServiceNameFromFullName( const SimpleString Name )
00112 {
00113     int LastFind;
00114 
00115     if ( Name.IsEmpty() )
00116     {
00117         return SimpleString::EmptyString;
00118     }
00119 
00120     if ( (LastFind=Name.Find("._tcp.")) >= 0 )
00121     {
00122         // TCP DnsSdService
00123         return Name.SubString( 0, LastFind );
00124     }
00125     else
00126     {
00127         if ( (LastFind=Name.Find("._udp.")) >= 0 )
00128         {
00129             // UDP DnsSdService
00130             return Name.SubString( 0, LastFind );
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     // Return the full name because it seems to be the DNSSDName
00135     return Name;
00136 }

00138 void DnsSdService::Empty()
00139 {
00140     CompleteServiceName.Empty();
00141     Init();
00142 }
00143 
00144 bool DnsSdService::CheckProtocol( const SimpleString Protocol )
00145 {
00146     int PreviousUnderscore;
00147     int ProtocolLenght;
00148 
00149     if ( Protocol.IsEmpty() )
00150     {
00151         return false;
00152     }
00153 
00154     if ( Protocol[0] != '_' )
00155     {
00156         return false;
00157     }
00158 
00159     PreviousUnderscore = 0;
00160     ProtocolLenght = -1;
00161     for(;;)
00162     {
00163         ProtocolLenght++;
00164 
00165         if( ProtocolLenght >= (int)Protocol.GetLength() )
00166             break;
00167 
00168         if( Protocol[ProtocolLenght] == '_' )
00169         {
00170             PreviousUnderscore++;
00171             if ( PreviousUnderscore > 2 )
00172             {
00173                 // protocol must not more than 2 underscores
00174                 // Bad parameters
00175                 return false;
00176             }
00177             continue;
00178         }
00179     }
00180 
00181     if ( ProtocolLenght <= 0 )
00182         return false;
00183 
00184     return true;
00185 }
00186 
00187 bool DnsSdService::CheckName( const SimpleString eName )
00188 {
00189     if ( eName.IsEmpty() )
00190     {
00191         return false;
00192     }
00193 
00194     if ( eName.GetLength() > ServiceField-1 )
00195     {
00196             return false;
00197     }
00198 
00199     return true;
00200 }

00224 DnsSdService::DnsSdService( const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString eRegType, const SimpleString eDomain, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString eHostName /* = SimpleString::EmptyString */ )
00225 {
00226     // Create full name.
00227     SimpleString TmpString = ServiceName;
00228     TmpString += ".";
00229     TmpString += eRegType;
00230     if ( eRegType.GetLength() > 0 )
00231     {
00232         if ( eRegType[eRegType.GetLength()-1] != '.' )
00233         {
00234             TmpString += ".";
00235         }
00236     }
00237     TmpString += eDomain;
00238 
00239     Init( TmpString, ePort, eHostName );
00240 }

00242 DnsSdService::DnsSdService( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eProtocol, TransportProtocol enTransport, const SimpleString eDomain, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString eHostName /* = SimpleString::EmptyString */ )
00243 {
00244     Empty();
00245 
00246     if ( eName.IsEmpty() || eProtocol.IsEmpty() || ePort == 0 || (enTransport != TCP && enTransport != UDP))
00247     {
00248         return;
00249     }
00250 
00251     // Check parameters values
00252     if ( CheckProtocol( eProtocol ) == false )
00253     {
00254         Init();
00255         return;
00256     }
00257     Protocol = eProtocol;
00258 
00259     // Check parameters values
00260     if ( CheckName( Name ) == false )
00261     {
00262         Init();
00263         return;
00264     }
00265 
00266     Name = eName;
00267 
00268     if ( eDomain.IsEmpty() )
00269     {
00270         Domain = "local.";
00271     }
00272     else
00273     {
00274         Domain = eDomain;
00275     }
00276 
00277     if ( enTransport == TCP )
00278     {
00279         Transport = "_tcp";
00280     }
00281     else
00282     {
00283         Transport = "_udp";
00284     }
00285     nTransport = enTransport;
00286 
00287     Port = ePort;
00288 
00289     if ( eHostName.IsEmpty() )
00290     {
00291         HostName = Socket::GetHostName();
00292     }
00293     else
00294     {
00295         HostName = eHostName;
00296     }
00297 }

00299 SimpleString DnsSdService::ToString()
00300 {
00301     SimpleString Generate(Name);
00302 /*  Generate += ".";
00303     Generate += Protocol;
00304     Generate += ".";
00305     Generate += Transport;
00306     Generate += ".";
00307     Generate += Domain; */
00308     Generate += " on port ";
00309     Generate += Port;
00310     Generate += " of host ";
00311     Generate += HostName;;
00312 
00313     return Generate;
00314 }

00326     AvahiThreadedPoll * RegisterService::AvahiPollWithThread = (AvahiThreadedPoll *)NULL;
00327

00329     unsigned int                RegisterService::AvahiRegisteringCounter = 0;
00330

00335 void RegisterService::Init( bool FromConstructor )
00336 {
00337     Registered = false;
00338     AutoRenameWasAsk = false;
00339     ProtocolAndTransport.Empty();
00340 
00341     // Free DNS-SD stuff
00342     InitZeroconfSubsystem( FromConstructor );
00343 }

00381 // function to reset avahi stuff
00382 void RegisterService::InitZeroconfSubsystem( bool FromConstructor )
00383 {
00384 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00385     if ( FromConstructor == false )
00386     {
00387         if ( ConnectionOk )
00388         {
00389             DNSServiceRefDeallocate(DnsSdConnection);
00390         }
00391     }
00392     DnsSdConnection = NULL;
00393     ConnectionOk = false;
00394 
00395 #else
00396 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00397 
00398     // Lock Avahi connection
00399     SmartLocker SL_AvahiRegisteringLocker(AvahiRegisteringLocker);
00400 
00401     if ( FromConstructor == true )
00402     {
00403         // Add a new instance
00404         AvahiRegisteringCounter++;
00405 
00406         // Init non static members
00407         AvahiGroup = (AvahiEntryGroup *)NULL;
00408         AvahiTxtRecord = (AvahiStringList *)NULL;
00409         RegistrationProcessDone = false;
00410 
00411         if ( AvahiRegisteringCounter == 1 )
00412         {
00413             OmiscidTrace( "Init Avahi.\n" );
00414 
00415             // 1st instance, create avahi connection
00416             AvahiPollWithThread = avahi_threaded_poll_new();
00417             if ( AvahiPollWithThread == (AvahiThreadedPoll *)NULL )
00418             {
00419                 OmiscidError( "Could not create Avahi poll\n" );
00420                 return;
00421             }
00422 
00423             int error;
00424 
00425             AvahiConnection = avahi_client_new( avahi_threaded_poll_get(AvahiPollWithThread), (AvahiClientFlags)0, NULL, (void*)this, &error );
00426             if ( AvahiConnection == (AvahiClient *)NULL )
00427             {
00428                 OmiscidError( "Could not create Avahi client %s\n", avahi_strerror(error) );
00429                 avahi_threaded_poll_free(AvahiPollWithThread);
00430                 return;
00431             }
00432 
00433             // Start the poll
00434             avahi_threaded_poll_lock(AvahiPollWithThread);
00435             if ( avahi_threaded_poll_start(AvahiPollWithThread) < 0)
00436             {
00437                 avahi_threaded_poll_unlock(AvahiPollWithThread);
00438                 OmiscidError( "Could not start Avahi poll\n" );
00439                 avahi_client_free(AvahiConnection);
00440                 AvahiConnection = (AvahiClient *)NULL;
00441                 avahi_threaded_poll_free(AvahiPollWithThread);
00442                 AvahiPollWithThread =(AvahiThreadedPoll *)NULL;
00443                 return;
00444             }
00445             avahi_threaded_poll_unlock(AvahiPollWithThread);
00446         }
00447     }
00448     else
00449     {
00450         // Remove an instance
00451         AvahiRegisteringCounter--;
00452 
00453         if ( AvahiPollWithThread != (AvahiThreadedPoll *)NULL )
00454         {
00455             avahi_threaded_poll_lock(AvahiPollWithThread);
00456         }
00457 
00458         // Free non static Avahi stuff in inverse order of allocation
00459         if ( AvahiTxtRecord != (AvahiStringList *)NULL )
00460         {
00461             avahi_string_list_free( AvahiTxtRecord );
00462             AvahiTxtRecord = (AvahiStringList *)NULL;
00463         }
00464 
00465         if ( AvahiGroup != (AvahiEntryGroup *)NULL )
00466         {
00467             avahi_entry_group_free(AvahiGroup);
00468             AvahiGroup = (AvahiEntryGroup *)NULL;
00469         }
00470 
00471         RegistrationProcessDone = false;
00472 
00473         if ( AvahiRegisteringCounter == 0 )
00474         {
00475             // Last instance, remove everything
00476             OmiscidTrace( "Free Avahi.\n" );
00477 
00478             OmiscidTrace( "Stop avahi poll.\n" );
00479             if ( AvahiPollWithThread != (AvahiThreadedPoll *)NULL )
00480             {
00481                 // Stop the threaded poll
00482                 avahi_threaded_poll_stop(AvahiPollWithThread);
00483                 avahi_threaded_poll_unlock(AvahiPollWithThread);
00484             }
00485 
00486             // Free static Avahi stuff in inverse order of allocation
00487             OmiscidTrace( "Free avahi connection.\n" );
00488             if ( AvahiConnection != (AvahiClient *)NULL )
00489             {
00490                 avahi_client_free(AvahiConnection);
00491             }
00492 
00493             OmiscidTrace( "Free avahi poll.\n" );
00494             if ( AvahiPollWithThread != (AvahiThreadedPoll *)NULL )
00495             {
00496                 // Destroy the poll
00497                 avahi_threaded_poll_free(AvahiPollWithThread);
00498             }
00499 
00500             // Set pointer to NULL
00501             AvahiGroup = (AvahiEntryGroup *)NULL;
00502             AvahiPollWithThread = (AvahiThreadedPoll *)NULL;
00503 
00504             OmiscidTrace( "Free avahi done.\n" );
00505         }
00506 
00507         if ( AvahiPollWithThread != (AvahiThreadedPoll *)NULL )
00508         {
00509             avahi_threaded_poll_unlock(AvahiPollWithThread);
00510         }
00511     }
00512 
00513 #endif
00514 #endif
00515 }

00524 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00525 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE RegisterService::DnsRegisterReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *name, const char *regtype, const char *domain, void *context )
00526 {
00527     RegisterService * MyThis = (RegisterService*)context;
00528 
00529     if ( errorCode == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00530     {
00531         MyThis->Registered = true;
00532         MyThis->RegisteredName = name;
00533         MyThis->CompleteServiceName = name;
00534         MyThis->CompleteServiceName += ".";
00535         MyThis->CompleteServiceName += regtype;
00536         MyThis->CompleteServiceName += domain;
00537     }
00538     else
00539     {
00540         MyThis->Registered = false;
00541     }
00542 }
00543 #else
00544 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00545 
00546 void RegisterService::LaunchRegisterProcess( bool FromAvahiPollThread )
00547 {
00548     if ( FromAvahiPollThread == false )
00549     {
00550         // lock the poll
00551         avahi_threaded_poll_lock(AvahiPollWithThread);
00552     }
00553 
00554     if ( AvahiGroup != (AvahiEntryGroup *)NULL )
00555     {
00556         avahi_entry_group_free(AvahiGroup);
00557     }
00558 
00559     AvahiGroup = avahi_entry_group_new( AvahiConnection, DnsRegisterReply, (void*)this );
00560     if ( AvahiGroup == (AvahiEntryGroup *)NULL )
00561     {
00562         OmiscidError( "Could not create Avahi group (%s).\n", avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(AvahiConnection)) );
00563         goto EndOfLaunchRegisterProcess;
00564     }
00565 
00566     if ( AvahiTxtRecord != (AvahiStringList *)NULL )
00567     {
00568         if ( avahi_entry_group_add_service_strlst(AvahiGroup, AVAHI_IF_UNSPEC, AVAHI_PROTO_UNSPEC, (AvahiPublishFlags)0, (char*)Name.GetStr(),
00569             (char*)ProtocolAndTransport.GetStr(), (char*)Domain.GetStr(), NULL, Port, AvahiTxtRecord) < 0 )
00570         {
00571             Init(false);
00572             OmiscidError( "Could not add service group (with TXTRecord)  (%s).\n", avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(AvahiConnection)) );
00573             goto EndOfLaunchRegisterProcess;
00574         }
00575     }
00576     else
00577     {
00578         if ( avahi_entry_group_add_service(AvahiGroup, AVAHI_IF_UNSPEC, AVAHI_PROTO_UNSPEC, (AvahiPublishFlags)0, (char*)Name.GetStr(),
00579             (char*)ProtocolAndTransport.GetStr(), (char*)Domain.GetStr(), NULL, Port, NULL) < 0 )
00580         {
00581             Init(false);
00582             OmiscidError( "Could not add service group (%s).\n", avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(AvahiConnection)) );
00583             goto EndOfLaunchRegisterProcess;
00584         }
00585     }
00586 
00587     // Tell the server to register the service
00588     if ( avahi_entry_group_commit(AvahiGroup) < 0 )
00589     {
00590         Init(false);
00591         OmiscidError( "Could not commit service group (%s).\n", avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(AvahiConnection)) );
00592         goto EndOfLaunchRegisterProcess;
00593     }
00594 
00595 EndOfLaunchRegisterProcess:
00596     if ( FromAvahiPollThread == false )
00597     {
00598         // lock the poll
00599         avahi_threaded_poll_unlock(AvahiPollWithThread);
00600     }
00601 }
00602 
00603 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE RegisterService::DnsRegisterReply(AvahiEntryGroup *g, AvahiEntryGroupState state, AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED void *userdata)
00604 {
00605     char * tmpc = NULL;
00606     RegisterService * MyThis = (RegisterService*)userdata;
00607 
00608     switch (state)
00609     {
00610         case AVAHI_ENTRY_GROUP_ESTABLISHED :
00611             // The entry group has been established successfully
00612             // OmiscidTrace( "Service '%s' successfully established.\n", MyThis->Name.GetStr() );
00613             MyThis->Registered = true;
00614             MyThis->RegisteredName = MyThis->Name;
00615             MyThis->CompleteServiceName = MyThis->Name;
00616             MyThis->CompleteServiceName += ".";
00617             MyThis->CompleteServiceName += MyThis->ProtocolAndTransport;
00618             MyThis->CompleteServiceName += MyThis->Domain;
00619             if ( MyThis->Domain == "local" )
00620             {
00621                 MyThis->CompleteServiceName += ".";
00622             }
00623             MyThis->RegistrationProcessDone = true;
00624             break;
00625 
00626         case AVAHI_ENTRY_GROUP_COLLISION :
00627             if ( MyThis->AutoRenameWasAsk == true )
00628             {
00629                 // A service name collision happened. Let's pick a new name
00630                 tmpc = avahi_alternative_service_name(MyThis->Name.GetStr());
00631                 MyThis->Name = tmpc;
00632                 avahi_free(tmpc);
00633 
00634                 OmiscidTrace( "Service name collision, try to rename service to '%s'\n", tmpc );
00635 
00636                 // And recreate the services
00637                 MyThis->LaunchRegisterProcess(true);
00638             }
00639             else
00640             {
00641                 // We do not try to solve name conflict
00642                 MyThis->RegistrationProcessDone = true;
00643             }
00644             break;
00645 
00646         case AVAHI_ENTRY_GROUP_FAILURE:
00647             // Some kind of failure happened while we were registering our services
00648             OmiscidError( "Entry group failure\n" );
00649             MyThis->RegistrationProcessDone = true;
00650             break;
00651 
00652         case AVAHI_ENTRY_GROUP_UNCOMMITED:
00653         case AVAHI_ENTRY_GROUP_REGISTERING:
00654             // The other (good ???) stuff
00655             break;
00656     }
00657 }
00658 #endif
00659 #endif
00660 
00661 bool RegisterService::IsRegistered()
00662 {
00663     return Registered;
00664 }
00665 
00666 bool RegisterService::Register(bool AutoRename /*= true */)
00667 {
00668     if ( Registered )
00669     {
00670         OmiscidError( "Service is already registrered.\n" );
00671         return false;
00672     }
00673 
00674     // Set autorename flag
00675     AutoRenameWasAsk = AutoRename;
00676 
00677     // Compute _x._proto...
00678     // <Name> . "_tcp" or <Name> . "_udp"
00679     ProtocolAndTransport  = Protocol;
00680     ProtocolAndTransport += ".";
00681     ProtocolAndTransport += Transport;
00682 
00683 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00684     DNSServiceFlags RenamingFlags = (DNSServiceFlags)0; // auto rename
00685     if ( AutoRenameWasAsk == false )
00686     {
00687         RenamingFlags = kDNSServiceFlagsNoAutoRename;
00688     }
00689 
00690     int err = kDNSServiceErr_Unknown;
00691 
00692     err = DNSServiceRegister( &DnsSdConnection,  RenamingFlags, 0 /* all network */,
00693         (char*)Name.GetStr(), (char*)ProtocolAndTransport.GetStr(),
00694         (char*)Domain.GetStr(), NULL, (uint16_t)htons(Port), (uint16_t)Properties.GetTXTRecordLength(),
00695         (char*)Properties.ExportTXTRecord(), DnsRegisterReply, (void*)this );
00696 
00697     if ( err == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00698     {
00699         // We did connection to the DNS-SD Daemon
00700         ConnectionOk = true;
00701 
00702         // Wait for its answer
00703         if ( DNSServiceProcessResult( DnsSdConnection ) == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00704         {
00705             err = kDNSServiceErr_NoError;
00706         }
00707     }
00708     else
00709     {
00710         ConnectionOk = false;
00711         DNSServiceRefDeallocate(DnsSdConnection);
00712         DnsSdConnection = NULL;
00713     }
00714 #else
00715 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00716 
00717     SmartLocker SL_AvahiRegisteringLocker(AvahiRegisteringLocker);
00718 
00719     if ( AvahiConnection == (AvahiClient *)NULL )
00720     {
00721         OmiscidError( "Avahi connection not initialised.\n" );
00722         return false;
00723     }
00724 
00725     // Construct TXTRecord
00726     int PosProperty;
00727     AvahiTxtRecord = (AvahiStringList *)NULL;
00728     for( PosProperty = 0; PosProperty < Properties.GetNumberOfProperties(); PosProperty++ )
00729     {
00730         ServiceProperty& CurrentProperty = Properties.GetProperty(PosProperty);
00731         AvahiTxtRecord = avahi_string_list_add_pair( AvahiTxtRecord, CurrentProperty.GetName().GetStr(),
00732             CurrentProperty.GetValue().GetStr() );
00733     }
00734 
00735     // Reset event before launch process
00736     // No need to mutex it because of there is one producer/one consumer
00737     RegistrationProcessDone = false;
00738 
00739     // Avahi static members unlock
00740     SL_AvahiRegisteringLocker.Unlock();
00741 
00742     // We are connected, add the service
00743     LaunchRegisterProcess(false);
00744 
00745     // Run over the loop until work is done or failed
00746     while( RegistrationProcessDone == false )
00747     {
00748         Thread::Sleep(10);
00749     }
00750 
00751 #endif
00752 #endif
00753 
00754     return Registered;
00755 }
